organisation_name: active community for value and fit (acvfit)
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
membership: We are member of Pole de competitive finance innovation, of Syntec Numérqiue, of Echalliance, of Société Française de Geriatrie et Gerontologie, of EUGMS (european geriatric society), of CATEL, of CIU (centre d'innovation et d'usage de Nice-France)

goals__remit:
ACVFIT is a e-health and smart city company. Our main product is a web based and web app healthy aging and wellness plateform providing guidance for change management so our customers can manage their chronic disease and daily quality of life. It can be used cross generations as well. 
Our vision is to support health prevention and work aligned with the health care systems to maximize the health care ressources and make mobile health and telemedecine part of disease management.
